design_philosophy.mood: A modern digital command center for global journalism. Clean, white-space heavy, with sharp typographic hierarchy.

landing_page.structure: Full-viewport height. Header transparent absolute top. Map centered.
landing_page.interaction: Clicking a country opens a sliding Side Sheet (Shadcn Sheet) from the right.

admin_panel.structure: Sidebar navigation (collapsed on mobile). Main content area with breadcrumbs.
admin_panel.table_style: Minimalist rows. No vertical borders. Header with light gray background.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-none px-6 py-2 font-medium tracking-wide transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-none px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all

cards.style: bg-white border border-border shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all rounded-none
cards.usage: Used for stats in admin panel or newspaper detailed view.

inputs.style: rounded-none border-slate-200 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-slate-900 focus:border-slate-900 bg-transparent

instructions_to_main_agent: Use `shadcn/ui` components for all interactive elements (Sheet, Dialog, Input, Table).
Use a TopoJSON file for the world map. Fetch it from a reliable CDN like `https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/world-atlas@2/countries-110m.json`.
Ensure the Admin Panel is protected by a simple Login (mock auth or simple JWT).
The 'Country Detail' view MUST be a Sidebar/Sheet that slides over the map, NOT a new page, to maintain context.
Use the provided colors to customize the Tailwind config.
Make sure typography uses Playfair Display for all Headers to give that 'Newspaper' feel.
The admin dashboard should list countries that have newspapers added. If a country has 0 newspapers, it can be hidden or shown as empty.
